inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Methods: A consecutive series of patients with High Risk Non-Muscle Invasive Bladder Cancer will be enrolled in several centres

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patients selected for the study, are centrally randomized (randomization is performed at the Sant'Andrea Hospital) to receive BCG induction treatment according to the standard protocol

inclusion.criterion: High Risk Non-Muscle Invasive Bladder Cancer
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Clinical evaluation: Patients with High Risk Non-Muscle Invasive Bladder Cancer will be enrolled

exclusion.criterion: Low Risk Non-Muscle Invasive Bladder Cancer
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient is a 25-year-old pregnant woman with symptoms of fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, dysuria, urgency, and frequency. She has no history of recurrent UTI prior to her pregnancy or any other underlying disease.
